item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Greenspirit Greenspirit
item.description:
@Greenspirit wrote:

All You Guys Rock ty for all your help and : Where i need 2 add This: make small tut for me lol:) [quote=“Rob A, post:6, topic:81910”]Add this in your voids

public void Rules() { sendQuest("@dre@~p00ningScape Rules~", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@cya@-- P00ningScape Terms Of User --", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@Like all servers we have rules that we", 8146); sendQuest("@dbl@ask you to follow while playing P00ningscape", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8148); sendQuest("@red@Here They Are:", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@1) No Use Of Bad Language Please", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@2) Do NOT! Mention Lagg We Know!", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@3) No Asking To Be/Buy Mod/Admin", 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@4) If you Noclip/Setitem you will be banned", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@5) No Server Advertising - Except Ours", 8158); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8159); sendQuest("@dbl@6) No Bug Abuse Report it to an admin (Gold Crown", 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@Thats All We ask, Please Note that these", 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules come into effect as from 01 Feb 07", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@And Yes you can barrage and range anywhere", 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@If you get told not to them point them here", 8165); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8166); sendQuest("@dbl@Thankyou for reading the new rules", 8167); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8168); sendQuest("@dbl@Rob And Nick - Owners Of P00ningscape", 8169); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8170); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8171); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8172); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Then you change what you want in that but leave the " and @dbl@ in

then search for end of frame testing

and add this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) { Rules(); } }[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Rob_A Rob A
item.description:
@Rob_A wrote:

Add this in your voids

public void Rules() { sendQuest("@dre@~p00ningScape Rules~", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@cya@-- P00ningScape Terms Of User --", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@Like all servers we have rules that we", 8146); sendQuest("@dbl@ask you to follow while playing P00ningscape", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8148); sendQuest("@red@Here They Are:", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@1) No Use Of Bad Language Please", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@2) Do NOT! Mention Lagg We Know!", 8152); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@3) No Asking To Be/Buy Mod/Admin", 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@4) If you Noclip/Setitem you will be banned", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@5) No Server Advertising - Except Ours", 8158); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8159); sendQuest("@dbl@6) No Bug Abuse Report it to an admin (Gold Crown", 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@Thats All We ask, Please Note that these", 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@Rules come into effect as from 01 Feb 07", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@And Yes you can barrage and range anywhere", 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@If you get told not to them point them here", 8165); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8166); sendQuest("@dbl@Thankyou for reading the new rules", 8167); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8168); sendQuest("@dbl@Rob And Nick - Owners Of P00ningscape", 8169); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8170); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8171); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8172); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } }

Then you change what you want in that but leave the " and @dbl@ in

then search for end of frame testing

and add this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules")) { Rules(); }

Read full topic
